name: Intelligence Network
perks: Agents assigned on CHOAM Infiltration produce 100% more Solari
Agents assigned on Landsraad Infiltration produce 100% more Influence

childs.name: Diplomatic Maneuvers
perks: Unlocks 1 Agent slot in Landsraad Infiltration
Agents assigend on a faction in Truce produce 10 Solari
Unlocks the Political Agreement Treaty

childs.name: Sietch Network
perks: +5% Intel production per ally Sietch
+50% Agent recruitment speed per ally Sietch
Unlocks the Bazaar Building in Sietch Tabr

childs.name: Sand Diplomancy
perks: Agents assigned on Arrakis Infiltration produce 30% more Authority
+30% relation gain with Sietch
+30% received resources when trading with Sietch Tabr

childs.name: Political Stance
perks: 3 Landsraad Guards appear near Imperial Base after every Landsraad Council
Each Treaty contracted with another faction grants a production bonus of +10% in ints associated ressource
Unlocks Embassy Building in Sietch Tabr

childs.name: Spying Logistic
perks: 150% Agent recruitment speed
+15% Intel production
Unlocks the Intelligence Agency Building in Sietch Tabr

childs.name: Stealth Gear
perks: Reduces the daily chance of Agent capture when assigned on a faction
-15% daily Supply drain in enemy territory
-50% spying mission Solari cost

childs.name: Desert Shadows
perks: You can assign 1 more Agents to CHOAM Infiltration
+5 max Agents
Allows the training of Assassin

childs.name: Counter Measures
perks: +150% Agent recruitment speed
Detect units with Camouflage from 50% further away
Unlocks 1 Agent slot in Counterintelligence
